content: One thing that @Neeraj Wahi suggested and that resonated very strongly with me (but wasn't embraced too enthusiastically?) is the idea of 'whimsy design'. Considering we have the design power maybe we should do that?
Yeah, I think we should definitely be thinking about that!

Example:

  • a 404 page with some nice graphic is not whimsy
  • same page with a fail whale or an octocat is whimsy
    (also it is memorable, and people grow attached to the brand and company)
What do you feel about the current 500 page design (octopus holding a broken Z)?
